item.title: Why I made this website
item.description: It serves as a space where I can introduce myself, showcase my favorite work, and as sort of a personal note-taking/journal. Let me begin with the introduction; perhaps I’ll add some showcases later. When you land on the page, you might be surprised by its simple and minimalistic approach. Let me explain. As most of the designers know, working on your portfolio can be a hell of a job! The ever-changing digital trends, never being satisfied, and often limited front-end skills.
